Review.Contenu: User experience is bad enough for me to move to a free online pdf editor. Adding simple elements like images or shapes is painfully slow to resize and move around.

DO NOT USE - SCAMMERSI cancelled a paid service back in July 2023 (I have the evidence and audit trail).  They have been continually taking a monthly subscription since! (todays date 19 Dec 23).  I am continually fobbed off, being told I will receive an email with regard to a refund but I hear nothing.  Do not use them unless you want to get ripped off.  You then have to cancel your credit/debit card in order for them to not take any more money, which is inconvenient.

Review.Titre: They promote it as a free pdf converter!
Review.Contenu: They promote it as a free pdf converter, but then when you have signed up and go through to convert your pdf it takes you to a payment page!! Sneaky sites are untrustworthy sites as far as I'm concerned.

Somehow this 'monster' slipped in.It intercepted a pdf I had downloaded, and wanted me to pay to view the file.  Say what?????Acrobat DC is free, and I have never had a problem opening them or saving them.The editing features in Acrobat are all I need.The features available in PDFSimpli are probably of value to users that have to manage multiple files.  Writing, reviewing or editing pdf files is not a task I will ever have to undertake.  'MS Word' is all I ever needed in my career.  I would have preferred Acrobat, but I had to think of my peers.  (Linking files was too much of a challenge for them...)Since I do not use the features available in PDFSimpli, I cannot evaluate the software.  I may as well have a speedometer on my tricycle that goes up to 160 mph.  Throw me and my trike out of a plane, and I will still not achieve 160 mph (> terminal velocity).PDFSimpli is not displayed as a program in 'Programs and Features', is not displayed in 'File Manager', hidden or otherwise, and is not detected by Revo Uninstaller Pro.Removing it was quite an exercise, but I think I finally nailed it.In conclusion, my only comment is that it should be easier to remove.This, at least for me, should be detected as a PUP () Potentially Unwanted Program)Jan Loimand

This site is a scam. They have poor customer service. Their website states money back guaranteed, which is all a lie. I signed up for a one time use. I never got any emails or updates on the membership breakdown. I paid what I needed to pay to sign up and before you know it - I had consecutive charges each month. I was charged 2X in the month of October 2023. They refuse to refund me for the month of October 2023. They keep insisting that it's their refund policy that can't allow them to refund me but in fact, throughout their website - they portray  "customer satisfaction" just on the surface of things, but when you explain your problem, they don't want to hear it. And will not help you. Period. Even after being in contact with THREE people on their customer service side, still no refund for the month October 2023. I wanted to give them a chance and use something that is not the popular demand platform that people would use. Instead I suggest signing up with ADOBE AROBAT or somewhere else. Membership is much better and customer service is the best!

I confirm an earlier comment that difficulties can occur with poor service by this company. I chose the option for free use for a few days with the option of continuance with a monthly payment to be charged.However, I never received access to the trial but was subsequently charged a monthly fee.There is a button to activate use but when I clicked the button nothing happened. I tried downloading the program again and other things but nothing allowed me access. Since I never activated the product, I did not expect any charge. However, when I viewed my bank statement I saw a charge from PDFSimpli for use of the product. As I didn't have access to use it, there was no agreement with PDFSimpli and no charge should be made. Subsequently, I contacted PDFSimpli for a refund and the company offered only a partial refund of less than half the amount I was charged. BEWARE! Do not choose this one. The system may work for some but BEWARE as you could have problems and will not receive a full refund.=======================================I just read the reply from PDFSimpli. The message indicates there are instructions that I don't remember.  The page I received had a button to choose to activate-I may not remember the correct label for it. Since it was not ever activated I should never have been charged.As well, BEWARE as this company does not inform you of the charge you are billed each month; a deduction occurs from your account without notice.  BEWARE as they offered a partial refund but since I never used the product it is not the correct refund amount. Almost $40/month is a high fee to pay when there is no access.If you want to use the product periodically, there may be an option at a lower cost for this, but I don't know where you find that offer. At least if you have issues with the product at the lower cost, the loss is less. Also, if you review the other comments here, note that others have written negative comments for this company. I didn't look for the reviews so I missed it. :-(

Review.Titre: Caution Advised: Disappointing Experience with PDF Master
Review.Contenu: I recently subscribed to PDF Master for what I believed would be a straightforward and short-term engagement, but my experience has turned out to be far from satisfactory. I opted for a 7-day trial, only to find myself automatically enrolled in a costly monthly subscription without explicit consent. Despite their website clearly stating a 30-day money-back guarantee, I faced significant resistance in seeking a refund for the unexpected charge.I want to highlight a critical point for potential customers, especially those in the EU. PDF Master's terms and conditions do mention a 14-day withdrawal period without any costs for EU users. However, when I exercised this right, my request was met with a contradictory statement about their non-refundable policy, despite the terms listed on their website.My efforts to resolve this issue through customer service proved futile, and each interaction left me feeling more frustrated. The responses I received were not only unhelpful but also seemed to dismiss the company’s own policies and EU consumer rights.I am now in a position where I am considering legal action, not just for the refund but also for the time and resources wasted in dealing with this matter. It's disheartening to encounter such practices in today's customer-centric business world.I advise potential customers to exercise caution with PDF Master. The lack of transparency and customer support, coupled with their disregard for their own policies and legal consumer rights, is concerning. It’s important for users to be aware of these issues before deciding to engage with their services.

Advertised as a free PDF editor. After going in and editing one of my documents, they told me to create an account by signing up "for free" in order to download and save the PDF I just finished editing. I made an account. Then they told me I had to choose a payment plan, and I was quite upset. I wouldn't have been as upset had they been more straightforward and honest in the beginning by saying this is a paid program. But to tell me this after I had already poured in my time and effort into editing my document? Completely unfair. For everyone out there, this is a paid program; it's not free. Just thought to share my experience to hopefully prevent someone else from falling into the same trap. However, aside from that, the program is pretty decent, has all the basics, and is easy to use.
